## Remarks
There are two ways to draw on this surface: by overriding the <xref:SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKGLTextureView.OnPaintSurface(SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKPaintGLSurfaceEventArgs)> method, or by attaching a handler to the <xref:SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKGLTextureView.PaintSurface> event.
> [!NOTE] > If SkiaSharp version v1.68.x or greater is being used, then events are > used instead of renderers. See > <xref:SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKGLTextureView.PaintSurface>.
